What we do.","pause":"","link":"https://www.cville.k12.in.us/site/default.aspx?PageType=3&DomainID=4&ModuleInstanceID=8&ViewID=6446EE88-D30C-497E-9316-3F8874B3E108&RenderLoc=0&FlexDataID=2507&PageID=1","target":"_self"},{"photoname":"CCSC","src":"Hoover.JPG?rnd=0.519966375790521","caption":"Family Friendly
Schools","pause":"","link":"https://www.cville.k12.in.us/site/default.aspx?PageType=3&DomainID=4&ModuleInstanceID=8&ViewID=6446EE88-D30C-497E-9316-3F8874B3E108&RenderLoc=0&FlexDataID=3859&PageID=1","target":"_self"},{"photoname":"A Culture of Caring ","src":"Hoov-Tecumseh.png?rnd=0.754496676733017","caption":"Crawfordsville students build upon a community legacy of caring for others.","pause":"","link":"https://www.cville.k12.in.us/site/default.aspx?PageType=3&DomainID=4&ModuleInstanceID=8&ViewID=6446EE88-D30C-497E-9316-3F8874B3E108&RenderLoc=0&FlexDataID=2254&PageID=1","target":"_self"},{"photoname":"A Commitment to Academic Excellence","src":"CHS1.png?rnd=0.347317066671009","caption":"Crawfordsville faculty and staff meet the academic needs of all students.","pause":"","link":"https://www.cville.k12.in.us/site/default.aspx?PageType=3&DomainID=4&ModuleInstanceID=8&ViewID=6446EE88-D30C-497E-9316-3F8874B3E108&RenderLoc=0&FlexDataID=2255&PageID=1","target":"_self"},{"photoname":"CCSC Athletics and Arts: A Proud Tradition of Success","src":"Soccer_Champs.png?rnd=0.322813820709853","caption":"Sports and Dance within the Crawfordsville Community School Corporation are synonymous with the word success.","pause":"","link":"https://www.cville.k12.in.us/site/default.aspx?PageType=3&DomainID=4&ModuleInstanceID=8&ViewID=6446EE88-D30C-497E-9316-3F8874B3E108&RenderLoc=0&FlexDataID=2256&PageID=1","target":"_self"},{"photoname":"No Limits","src":"famousgrads.png?rnd=0.193768618252952","caption":"Crawfordsville graduates have exciting, important careers.","pause":"","link":"https://www.cville.k12.in.us/site/default.aspx?PageType=3&DomainID=4&ModuleInstanceID=8&ViewID=6446EE88-D30C-497E-9316-3F8874B3E108&RenderLoc=0&FlexDataID=2272&PageID=1","target":"_self"}]}}
